channel.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
channel.description:
Well I was wondering what are the best stats for bounty hunter does anyone know?
EDIT I'm thinking: Attack - 99 Strength - 99 Defence - 60 Range - 99 Magic - 99 Prayer - 52

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:19, topic:187487”]Well, you see, you can be teamed. You need a decent defence not only for protection, but for barrows. If you want to last, I recommend at least that if not higher. Shaving off 4 strength and adding to defence or attack is also recommended. People in BH are there to win, but they don’t know how. They get the highest strength possible and don’t think of how high of an attack you need to use it.

Just barraging and blitzing will not do it. You obviously don’t pk much ;/.[/quote]
I don’t pk on p2p cause i’m f2p, but about 70-80% of my time on runescape i’ve pked. That’s after doing all the quests and being like level 60. I have 64 def right now and that does me good. I don’t really think you would bring barrows into Bounty Hunter, not worth it. I’d just bring Some mystic, Blk D’hide, and maybe a Helm of Neitznot.
I’m gonna become p2p soon and the first thing i’ll probably do is raise up my mage to 82 and do a buncha quests and skills so i can do the Desert Treasure quest and get Ancients.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Well, you see, you can be teamed. You need a decent defence not only for protection, but for barrows. If you want to last, I recommend at least that if not higher. Shaving off 4 strength and adding to defence or attack is also recommended. People in BH are there to win, but they don’t know how. They get the highest strength possible and don’t think of how high of an attack you need to use it.

Just barraging and blitzing will not do it. You obviously don’t pk much ;/.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:15, topic:187487”]99 def
99 attack
99 prayer
99 strength
99 magic
99 ranged
99 summoning[/quote]
Wow…

[quote=“exe626, post:17, topic:187487”]Anywhere from 97-99? Hmm.

80 Attack
85 Strength
70 Defence
85 Hit Points
52 Prayer

The would put you about level 98. Adding summoning is pointless. No matter how many ranged/magic levels after those stats, you will not gain another combat level. The only thing in question from those levels is Hit Points, which you could calculate.[/quote]
Eh… 70 def isn’t really needed. So is 80 attk, no one brings Gses in. 70 Attk is good for Whip and Dds. All you need to own bounty hunter are some Locates, Barrages/Blitzes(Ice) and k0ing ppl with dds and finishing it off with a whip. That’s the easiest way. Or you could bring range and use onyx/dragonstone arrows and hit like 50’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Anywhere from 97-99? Hmm.

80 Attack
85 Strength
70 Defence
85 Hit Points
52 Prayer

The would put you about level 98. Adding summoning is pointless. No matter how many ranged/magic levels after those stats, you will not gain another combat level. The only thing in question from those levels is Hit Points, which you could calculate.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

exe626:

Well, I’m not sure what the high level crater requires, but if you used my method, you’d be roughly level 104-105, even if you had 94 magic.

Level 107 I might go for it…

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

bootnecklad:

Train magic so you don’t get any hp?

Lmfao. Why? Hp is good when you’re p2p, or else everyone k0s u in a matter of seconds.

.Kaboom:

Well, the combination I said, 99 attack, 92 strength, 60 def, and 52 prayer 1 ranged and 1 magic with a calculated 92 hp, you would be 106 combat which puts you in the lower chamber[/quote][quote=“exe626, post:11, topic:187487”]Well, I’m not sure what the high level crater requires, but if you used my method, you’d be roughly level 104-105, even if you had 94 magic.

Lower Crater - Levels 1-55
Medium Crater- Levels 50-100
High Crater - Levels 95-138 (P2p) 126 (F2p)

So the best way to have a good bounty hunter dude is to have him in the Medium Crater.around levels 97-99 cb would be pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Well this is what I think if you’re a member and don’t care about losing anything.

70 attk
99 str
1 def
52 pray
94 mage
70 range

Bring whip, Dds. Just use Smite and barrage the hell outa the guy till he uses Prot. from Magic then have your spec ready and k0 him.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bounty Hunter stats?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Well I do know that higher attack means you hit more often, so 70 attack 99 strenght would hit Higher. But 99 attack 70 strength would hit more often

EDIT - hang on:

[quote=“Niall”][quote author=bootnecklad link=action=profile;u=40490 date=1185244441]

Nah, pretty boring

Also, why do I barely hit with a whip :(?

i aways hit low with whips the max i hit is like 31 i guess it depens on what u fighting and your str lvl and bounes

That’s pretty much the most you’ll hit. Whip is one of those weapons where you need higher, or equal attack to hit consistently.

So would 99/90 hit better than 90/99?

[/quote]

99/90 would hit a LOT more often than 90/99 but 90/99 would hit higher.[/quote]

Read full topic
